filteredArticles.headline: U.S. Supreme Court will hear Philadelphia same-sex foster parents case
filteredArticles.abstract: The City of Philadelphia alleged that Catholic Social Services violated the city's nondiscrimination laws by refusing to provide adoption services to same-sex couples.

dominantMedia.title: lgbt.jpg
dominantMedia.content: Philadelphia terminated its contract with Catholic Social Services because they violated the city's nondiscrimination laws.

filteredArticles.headline: Phila. students talk climate change and poverty at event sponsored by Penn Paideia course
filteredArticles.abstract: Harris Sokoloff and Chris Satullo, instructors of the EDUC 245 course "Can We Talk?," organized the event, which is the first in a series of three that they will host this semester.

dominantMedia.title: Paideia Program 003.jpg
dominantMedia.content: At the first of three "Can We Talk?" events, students discussed various political issues.
